Functions.Name: CreateZXGraphicsView
Functions.Summary: Create graphics view for drawing ZX Spectrum graphics.

Functions.Description: For the attributes, a single attribute value can be passed, or optionally an attribute map can be passed. An attribute map should hold an attribute for each character of the image.
Functions.Name: DrawZXBitImage
Functions.Summary: Draw ZX Spectrum pixels to a graphics view. Height and width are specified in characters.
Functions.Usage:
glyphData = GetMemPtr(0x3ff8)
image = CreateZXGraphicsView(8, 8)
DrawZXBitImage(image, glyphData, 0, 0, 1, 1)

Functions.Name: DrawZXBitImageFineY
Functions.Summary: Draw ZX Spectrum pixels to a graphics view. Height is specified in pixels. Width is specified in characters.
Functions.Usage:
glyphData = GetMemPtr(0x3ff8)
image = CreateZXGraphicsView(8, 8)
DrawZXBitImageFineY(image, glyphData, 0, 0, 1, 4)
